title: From Bitcoin to XRP: Key cryptocurrency terms and what they mean
description: As Bitcoin's price goes up once again, here's a guide to some of the crypto market's trickiest terms.
content:
Liv McMahon, Joe Tidy & Brandon Drenon
Bitcoin's price reaching a new high of $120,000 (£89,000) - buoyed by US President Donald Trump's crypto-friendly stance - has kept the buzzy world of cryp… [+7365 chars]
